description: This file defines the SessionProvider class responsible for managing user session state in a Flutter application. It handles login, logout, and session bootstrapping using an ApiClient and AuthService. It also provides user information and login status.

classes.name: SessionProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class managing user session state, including login, logout, and initialization.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Factory method to instantiate a SessionProvider with ApiClient and AuthService.

methods.name: user
methods.description: Getter for the current User object.

methods.name: isBooting
methods.description: Indicates if the session is in bootstrap process.

methods.name: isLoggedIn
methods.description: Indicates if a user is currently logged in.

methods.name: boot
methods.description: Initializes the session, attempting to restore session state asynchronously.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Handles user login with email and password.

methods.name: loginWithGoogle
methods.description: Handles user login via Google Sign-In.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user and clears session data.
